name: Serpus v2
description:
This is a more balanced version of serpus which we made in 48 hours for a jam. Spent a couple hours fixing some bugs we knew about and difficulty mentioned in the comments, this version has some more indicators for where to go and an easy/medium/impossible difficulty.

Search the map, discover weapons, beat the boss....death is inevitable 

Music progress depending on both your and the bosses health

Made for the SA game jam 2021

Controls:

WASD - move

Q - switch weapons

E - interact Space - dodge
